subject: Fw: re San Health Matters interview segment on radio 2GB
preview: Hi Payal, Ok sure, we have added to the site: https://entcaresydney.com.au/a-prof-payal-mukherjee-spoke-to-2gbs-steve-price-for-hearing-awareness-week/ Great piece, I'm listening to it now in the bac

full_threads.body:
Hi Payal, 

Ok sure, we have added to the site: https://entcaresydney.com.au/a-prof-payal-mukherjee-spoke-to-2gbs-steve-price-for-hearing-awareness-week/

Great piece, I'm listening to it now in the background... And can't think of a time I have ever had my hearing checked - looks like your talk resonated with me. I'm sure my wife would support a check too
: )

Dear Heath,

can you please add this on as well as part of world hearing day and hearing awareness.

Will send you some photos too

Dr Payal Mukherjee MBBS. MS. FRACS. Phd Candidate
Clinical Associate Professor - University of Sydney
Deputy Chair - RACS NSW Committee
ENT Research Lead - RPA Institute of Academic Surgery
Adult and Paediatric ENT Surgeon
Otologist, Cochlear Implant and Skull Base Surgeon

Suite 210, SAN Clinic Tulloch
Sydney Adventist Hospital
185 Fox Valley Rd, Wahroonga 2076
P: 02 99898080 <tel:02%2099898080> F: 02 9475 0220 <tel:02%209475%200220>
W: www.entcaresydney.com.au <http://www.entcaresydney.com.au/>


From: Leisa OConnor <Leisa.OConnor@sah.org.au <mailto:Leisa.OConnor@sah.org.au>>
Sent: Wednesday, 6 March 2019 12:33 PM
To: 'payal Mukherjee'
Subject: FW: re San Health Matters interview segment on radio 2GB

Morning Payal


Not unexpectedly, interesting to hear how Steve took the conversation on another course…but all good re getting the hearing test message out ….


Did the producer take the instudio pics on your phone? If so wondering if I can get them asap as Id like to use them here
.

Hope it’s a lovely evening for you all tonight. Love to get those pics from tonight of you and Eesha and your mum to share with staff early tomorrow if it suits …and wondering if you’d mind asking someone to text me in the morning after the announcement….


Leisa





From: Leisa OConnor
Sent: Wednesday, 6 March 2019 9:39 AM
Subject: re San Health Matters interview segment on radio 2GB


San ENT surgeon Ass Payal Mukherjee spoke to 2GB’s Steve Price for Hearing Awareness week providing invaluable information and advice on the need for hearing tests. Steve also kindly reminded his audience of her inclusion as one of 4 nominees for NSW Premier’s Woman of the Year to be announced tomorrow.






Warm regards

Leisa



Leisa O’Connor
Corporate Communications Manager | Marketing, Corporate Communications and Business Development Unit
Adventist HealthCare | 185 Fox Valley Road, Wahroonga, NSW 2076

t: 02 9487 9416 <tel:02%209487%209416> | m: 0410 541 728 <tel:0410%20541%20728> | f: 02 9487 9875 <tel:02%209487%209875> | e: leisa.oconnor@sah.org.au <mailto:leisa.oconnor@sah.org.au>
